workshop.title: Packer Workshop
workshop.description: These labs will give you a basic understanding of Packer concepts and deployments

labs.title: Introduction
labs.description: Introduction to Building Packer images on OCI

labs.title: Lab 100: Cloud Infrastructure Configuration
labs.description: Build resources in your Trial Account

labs.title: Lab 300: First Packer Build
labs.description: Build your first Image in OCI

labs.title: Lab 400: Basic Concepts of Packer
labs.description: Multi-container Application deployment using a Database

labs.title: Lab 500: Full Docker Developer Image Build
labs.description: Build a Image complete with Desktop and Docker
